bank_package

Class BankProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • bank_package.BankProxy

  • public class BankProxy
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BankProxy(RealBank newRealBank)
      BankProxy creates a new proxy to a given Real Bank object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAccount(Account newAccount)
      addAccount adds a given account object to the real bank object
      boolean addCustomer(Customer customer)
      addCustomer adds a customer and associated accounts to the real bank
      boolean hasAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
      startLoginProcess asks the real bank if an account exists or not
      boolean hasCustomer(java.lang.String email)
      hasCustomer asks the bank if a customer exists or not
      boolean removeAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
      removeAccount removes a specific account from the real bank and from the owner
      Customer requestCustomer(java.lang.String email)
      requestCustomer requests a single customer from the real bank given a UUID
      java.util.Hashtable requestCustomerAccounts(java.lang.String email)
      requestCustomerAccounts returns account hash table associated with a single customer
      void saveAllBankDataToFile()
      saveAllBankDataToFile saves all bank data to file by creating a new temporary instance of the static real bank and writing to a file via object output stream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankProxy

        public BankProxy(RealBank newRealBank)
        BankProxy creates a new proxy to a given Real Bank object. used to protect sensitive data in the real bank from unauthorized access/modification.
        Parameters:
        newRealBank - instance of the Real Bank object to be referenced

    • Method Detail

      • addAccount

        public void addAccount(Account newAccount)
        addAccount adds a given account object to the real bank object
        Parameters:
        newAccount - account object to be added

      • requestCustomer

        public Customer requestCustomer(java.lang.String email)
        requestCustomer requests a single customer from the real bank given a UUID
        Parameters:
        email - email of the requested customer
        Returns:
        customer object associated with the given UUID

      • requestCustomerAccounts

        public java.util.Hashtable requestCustomerAccounts(java.lang.String email)
        requestCustomerAccounts returns account hash table associated with a single customer
        Parameters:
        email - email of the customer requesting the accounts
        Returns:
        returns a Hashtable object with Accounts as values and their respective account numbers as keys

      • removeAccount

        public boolean removeAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
        removeAccount removes a specific account from the real bank and from the owner
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - account number of the account object to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if successfully deleted, false otherwise

      • hasAccount

        public boolean hasAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
        startLoginProcess asks the real bank if an account exists or not
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - account number associated with the account object
        Returns:
        returns true if account exists, false otherwise

      • hasCustomer

        public boolean hasCustomer(java.lang.String email)
        hasCustomer asks the bank if a customer exists or not
        Parameters:
        email - email associated with the desired customer
        Returns:
        true if customer exists, false otherwise

      • addCustomer

        public boolean addCustomer(Customer customer)
        addCustomer adds a customer and associated accounts to the real bank
        Parameters:
        customer - customer object to be added
        Returns:
        returns true if customer was successfully added, false otherwise

      • saveAllBankDataToFile

        public void saveAllBankDataToFile()
        saveAllBankDataToFile saves all bank data to file by creating a new temporary instance of the static real bank and writing to a file via object output stream. streams are closed after it is finished.
